events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I'd like to know how to proceed.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
Assigning this refund case to the customer support representative specializing in returns and refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund request. Iâ€™m here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting a refund so I can assist you further?
The order number is #458921. The product arrived but it does not work as described and I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and provided instructions on how to return the product to us.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the product back as soon as possible.
We consider this refund case resolved as the return instructions have been delivered and the refund process started.
Just following up to check if you have returned the product and if the refund has been processed on your side.
I returned the product yesterday, and I have just received the refund confirmation. Thank you for your help!
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer confirmed receipt of funds.
